column4: hi, I own a Asus eeePc 701 and use 10.04, problem is that I started learn ruby. With the default layout, I cant type all symbols that I need. Does any one els know a solution ?
just change the layout then? (keyboard i assume)
should be possible to look at the keyboard layout as an image, maybe you can find it there
gnome-character-map can find it for you
